name: Get out of my controller! - Post Jam Edition
name_original: Get out of my controller! - Post Jam Edition
description:
This is a more polished version of my GMTK Game Jam 2020 game "Get out of my controller!" The original game can still be played here: https://nitramiuz.itch.io/get-out-of-my-controller

The viruses are trying to sabotage your controller! Try to stop them.

Features:

Three different towers with upgrades.

Melee the viruses by crushing them with the sticks.

Ten builtin waves, with unlimited randomly generated waves after that.

Differences from the Game Jam version:

2 more built in waves, a lot of balancing, better stick movement, bug fixes and volume settings.

3 difficulties

This was my first Game Jam game and I made all the art and sound myself. Enjoy!
